movie.title: The Brilliant Biograph: Earliest Moving Images of Europe
movie.title_english: The Brilliant Biograph: Earliest Moving Images of Europe
movie.title_long: The Brilliant Biograph: Earliest Moving Images of Europe (0000)
movie.description_intro: Eye Filmmuseum and the British Film Institute present a compilation film of newly-restored rare images from the first years of filmmaking. Immerse yourself in enchanting images of Venice, Berlin, Amsterdam and London from 120 years ago. Let yourself be carried away in the mesmerizing events and celebrities of the time, and feel the enthusiasm of early cinema that overcame the challenge of capturing life-like movement.
movie.description_full: Eye Filmmuseum and the British Film Institute present a compilation film of newly-restored rare images from the first years of filmmaking. Immerse yourself in enchanting images of Venice, Berlin, Amsterdam and London from 120 years ago. Let yourself be carried away in the mesmerizing events and celebrities of the time, and feel the enthusiasm of early cinema that overcame the challenge of capturing life-like movement.

movies.title: Make Us Dream
movies.summary: Documentary about the mercurial football career of Steven Gerrard, one of Liverpool FCs finest ever players.
movies.description_full: Documentary about the mercurial football career of Steven Gerrard, one of Liverpool FCs finest ever players.
movies.synopsis: Documentary about the mercurial football career of Steven Gerrard, one of Liverpool FCs finest ever players.

movies.title: Queen: Days of Our Lives
movies.summary: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.
movies.description_full: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.
movies.synopsis: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.

movies.title: The Decline of Western Civilization
movies.summary: The Los Angeles punk music scene circa 1980 is the focus of this film. With Alice Bag Band, Black Flag, Catholic Discipline, Circle Jerks, Fear, Germs, and X.
movies.description_full: The Los Angeles punk music scene circa 1980 is the focus of this film. With Alice Bag Band, Black Flag, Catholic Discipline, Circle Jerks, Fear, Germs, and X.
movies.synopsis: The Los Angeles punk music scene circa 1980 is the focus of this film. With Alice Bag Band, Black Flag, Catholic Discipline, Circle Jerks, Fear, Germs, and X.

movies.title: Justin Bieber: Never Say Never
movies.summary: The camera follows Justin Bieber (1994- ) during the ten days leading up to his August, 2010, sold-out show at Madison Square Garden. Footage of these ten days of concerts, rehearsals, and down time with boyhood friends, his mom, and his entourage is inter-cut with home movies, old photos, and interviews showing a musical prodigy who loves to perform, comes to the attention of an Atlanta agent via YouTube, impresses Usher, and rockets to international stardom soon after his 15th birthday. His manager emphasizes the importance of social media and of Justin's work ethic and personality in making him a star; the camera emphasizes Bieber's look. His mom and grandparents shine.
